trans-unit.source: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for lesing av et radsett bare dataflyten for datarader fra en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: To create an OracleDataReader, you must call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object, rather than directly using a constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en OracleDataReader, må du kalle den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objektet, i stedet for direkte ved hjelp av en konstruktør.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to a resultset by another process or thread while data is being read may be visible to the user of the OracleDataReader.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i et resultatsett av en annen prosess eller tråd når data blir lest kan være synlig for brukeren av OracleDataReader.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.IsClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A> are the only properties that you can call after the OracleDataReader is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.IsClosed%2A>og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A>bare egenskaper som du kan ringe når OracleDataReader er lukket.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.IsClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, you must call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.Close%2A> before you can call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I noen tilfeller må du kaller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.Close%2A>før du kan ringe <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: More than one OracleDataReader can be open at any given time.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn én OracleDataReader kan være åpen om gangen.

trans-unit.source: The following two Visual Basic examples demonstrate how to use an OracleDataReader to retrieve an Oracle `REF CURSOR`.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic eksemplene nedenfor viser hvordan du bruker en OracleDataReader til å hente en Oracle `REF CURSOR`.

trans-unit.source: These examples use tables that are defined in the Oracle Scott/Tiger schema, and require the following PL/SQL package and package body.
trans-unit.target: Disse eksemplene bruker tabeller som er definert i skjemaet Oracle Scott/Tiger, og krever at følgende PL/SQL-pakken og pakken meldingsteksten.

trans-unit.source: You must create these on your server to use the examples.
trans-unit.target: Du må opprette disse på serveren til å bruke eksempler.

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: Opprett følgende Oracle-pakke for Oracle-serveren.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR IN OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ``` Create the following Oracle package body on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR IN OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ```Opprette følgende Oracle pakken meldingsteksten i Oracle-serveren.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ``` This Visual Basic example executes a PL/SQL stored procedure that returns a `REF CURSOR` parameter, and reads the value as an OracleDataReader.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ```Dette eksemplet i Visual Basic utfører en PL/SQL-lagret prosedyre som returnerer en `REF CURSOR` parameteren og leser verdien som en OracleDataReader.

trans-unit.source: ```vb# Private Sub ReadOracleData(ByVal connectionString As String) Dim connection As New OracleConnection(connectionString) Dim command As New OracleCommand() Dim reader As OracleDataReader connection.Open() command.Connection = connection command.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_ONE_CURSOR" command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("N_EMPNO", OracleType.Number)).Value = 7369 command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("IO_CURSOR", OracleType.Cursor)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output reader = command.ExecuteReader() While (reader.Read()) ' Do something with the values. End While reader.Close() connection.Close() End Sub ``` This Visual Basic example executes a PL/SQL stored procedure that returns two `REF CURSOR` parameters, and reads the values using an OracleDataReader.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# Private Sub ReadOracleData(ByVal connectionString As String) Dim connection As New OracleConnection(connectionString) Dim command As New OracleCommand() Dim reader As OracleDataReader connection.Open() command.Connection = connection command.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_ONE_CURSOR" command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("N_EMPNO", OracleType.Number)).Value = 7369 command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("IO_CURSOR", OracleType.Cursor)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output reader = command.ExecuteReader() While (reader.Read()) ' Do something with the values. End While reader.Close() connection.Close() End Sub ```Dette eksemplet i Visual Basic utfører en PL/SQL-lagret prosedyre som returnerer to `REF CURSOR` parametere og leseoperasjoner verdier ved hjelp av en OracleDataReader.

trans-unit.source: ```vb# Private Sub ReadOracleData(ByVal connectionString As String) Dim dataSet As New DataSet() Dim connection As New OracleConnection(connectionString) Dim command As New OracleCommand() Dim reader As OracleDataReader connection.Open() command.Connection = connection command.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS" command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output reader = command.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.CloseConnection) While (reader.Read()) ' Do something with the values. End While reader.NextResult() While (reader.Read()) ' Do something with the values. End While reader.Close() connection.Close() End Sub ``` This C# example creates an Oracle table and loads it with data.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# Private Sub ReadOracleData(ByVal connectionString As String) Dim dataSet As New DataSet() Dim connection As New OracleConnection(connectionString) Dim command As New OracleCommand() Dim reader As OracleDataReader connection.Open() command.Connection = connection command.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS" command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output command.Parameters.Add(New OracleParameter("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output reader = command.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.CloseConnection) While (reader.Read()) ' Do something with the values. End While reader.NextResult() While (reader.Read()) ' Do something with the values. End While reader.Close() connection.Close() End Sub ```Dette C# eksemplet oppretter en Oracle-tabellen, og laster inn den med data.

trans-unit.source: You must run this example prior to running the subsequent example, which demonstrates using an OracleDataReader to access the data using OracleType structures.
trans-unit.target: Du må kjøre dette eksemplet før du kjører etterfølgende eksemplet som viser hvordan du bruker en OracleDataReader tilgang til dataene ved hjelp av OracleType strukturer.

trans-unit.source: ```c# public void Setup(string connectionString) { OracleConnection connection = new OracleConnection(connectionString); try { connection.Open(); OracleCommand command = connection.CreateCommand(); command.CommandText ="CREATE TABLE OracleTypesTable (MyVarchar2 varchar2(3000),MyNumber number(28,4) PRIMARY KEY,MyDate date, MyRaw raw(255))"; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); command.CommandText ="INSERT INTO OracleTypesTable VALUES ('test', 2, to_date('2000-01-11 12:54:01','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '0001020304')"; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); command.CommandText="SELECT * FROM OracleTypesTable"; } catch(Exception) { } finally { connection.Close(); } } ``` This C# example uses an OracleDataReader to access data, and uses several <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> structures to display the data.
trans-unit.target: ```c# public void Setup(string connectionString) { OracleConnection connection = new OracleConnection(connectionString); try { connection.Open(); OracleCommand command = connection.CreateCommand(); command.CommandText ="CREATE TABLE OracleTypesTable (MyVarchar2 varchar2(3000),MyNumber number(28,4) PRIMARY KEY,MyDate date, MyRaw raw(255))"; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); command.CommandText ="INSERT INTO OracleTypesTable VALUES ('test', 2, to_date('2000-01-11 12:54:01','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '0001020304')"; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); command.CommandText="SELECT * FROM OracleTypesTable"; } catch(Exception) { } finally { connection.Close(); } } ```Dette C# eksemplet bruker en OracleDataReader til å få tilgang til data, og flere <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>strukturer å vise dataene.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lukker det <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: More than one <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> can be open at any given time.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn én <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>kan være åpen om gangen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a connection, a `DataReader`, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Ikke kall `Close` eller `Dispose` en tilkobling, en `DataReader`, eller andre administrerte objekter i den `Finalize` metode for klassen.

trans-unit.source: In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly.
trans-unit.target: Du bør bare frigi uforvaltede ressurser som klassen eier direkte i en sluttbehandler.

trans-unit.source: If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klassen ikke eier uforvaltede ressurser, inneholder ikke en `Finalize` metoden i klassedefinisjonen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [datasanering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the depth of nesting for the current row.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir dybden på nesting for den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: The outermost table has a depth of zero.
trans-unit.target: Den ytterste tabellen har dybden null.

trans-unit.source: The depth of nesting for the current row.
trans-unit.target: Dybde for nesting for den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns in the current row.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall kolonner i den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: Includes hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder skjulte felt.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.VisibleFieldCount%2A> to exclude hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.VisibleFieldCount%2A>skal utelates skjulte felt.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.VisibleFieldCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: After executing a query that does not return rows, FieldCount returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Etter at utført en spørring som ikke returnerer rader, returnerer FieldCount 0.

trans-unit.source: When not positioned in a valid record set, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
trans-unit.target: Når det er ikke plassert i en gyldig registrere sett, 0. Hvis antallet kolonner i gjeldende post.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er -1.

trans-unit.source: There is no current connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen gjeldende tilkobling til en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den angitte kolonnen som en boolsk verdi.

trans-unit.source: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.
trans-unit.target: Leser en dataflyt byte fra den angitte kolonneforskyvning i bufferen som en matrise, med Start fra den angitte Bufferforskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: GetBytes returns the number of available bytes in the field.
trans-unit.target: GetBytes returnerer antall byte som er tilgjengelig i feltet.

trans-unit.source: In most cases this is the exact length of the field.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nøyaktige lengden på feltet i de fleste tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field.
trans-unit.target: Tallet kan imidlertid være lavere enn true lengden på feltet hvis `GetBytes` er allerede brukt til å hente byte i feltet.

trans-unit.source: This may be the case, for example, if the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> is reading a large data structure into a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være tilfellet, for eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>leser en stor datastruktur i en buffer.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den `SequentialAccess` at <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>.</xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>

trans-unit.source: If you pass a buffer that is a null value, GetBytes returns the length of the field in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender en buffer som er null, returnerer GetBytes lengden på feltet i byte.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The index within the field where the read operation is to begin.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i feltet der leseoperasjonen er å starte.

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen som kan lese dataflyten for byte.

trans-unit.source: The index where `buffer` is to begin the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen der `buffer` skal starte Skriveoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som skal leses.

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som leses.

trans-unit.source: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.
trans-unit.target: Leser en dataflyt tegn fra den angitte kolonneforskyvning i bufferen som en matrise, med Start fra den angitte Bufferforskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: GetChars returns the number of available characters in the field.
trans-unit.target: GetChars returnerer antallet tegn som er tilgjengelig i feltet.

trans-unit.source: In most cases this is the exact length of the field.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nøyaktige lengden på feltet i de fleste tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field.
trans-unit.target: Tallet kan imidlertid være lavere enn true lengden på feltet hvis `GetChars` er allerede brukt til å hente tegn i feltet.

trans-unit.source: This may be the case, for example, if the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> is reading a large data structure into a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være tilfellet, for eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>leser en stor datastruktur i en buffer.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den `SequentialAccess` at <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>.</xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>

trans-unit.source: If you pass a buffer that is a null value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender en buffer som er en nullverdi.

trans-unit.source: GetChars returns the length of the field in characters.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to read.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>som kan brukes til å gå gjennom radene i dataleseren.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit enumerator, in languages that support a foreach construct, it's simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the column at the specified ordinal in its Oracle format.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien i kolonnen ved det angitte ordenstallet i sitt Oracle-format.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref:System.DBNull> for null database columns.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref:System.DBNull>for null databasekolonner.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The Oracle value to return.
trans-unit.target: Oracle-verdien som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the attribute columns in the current row in Oracle format.
trans-unit.target: Henter alle attributtet kolonnene i den gjeldende raden i Oracle-format.

trans-unit.source: For most applications, the GetOracleValues method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetOracleValues gir en effektiv måte for henting av alle kolonner i stedet for å hente hver kolonne individuelt for de fleste programmer.

trans-unit.source: You can pass an <xref:System.Object> array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende en <xref:System.Object>matrise som inneholder færre enn antall kolonner i resultatraden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Only the amount of data the <xref:System.Object> array holds is copied to the array.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye data i <xref:System.Object>matrisen oppbevarer kopieres til matrisen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: You can also pass an <xref:System.Object> array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også sende en <xref:System.Object>matrise lengden er lenger enn antall kolonner i resultatraden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref:System.DBNull> for null database columns.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref:System.DBNull>for null databasekolonner.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Object> into which to copy the attribute columns.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Object>som skal kopieres kolonnene attributtet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The number of instances of <xref:System.Object> in the array.
trans-unit.target: Antallet forekomster av <xref:System.Object>i matrisen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column ordinal, given the name of the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter kolonnen ordenstall, får navnet på kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: GetOrdinal performs a case-sensitive lookup first.
trans-unit.target: GetOrdinal utfører et skiller oppslag først.

trans-unit.source: If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den ikke gjøres et andre samlingstype søk.

trans-unit.source: The method throws an `IndexOutOfRange` exception if the zero-based column ordinal is not found.
trans-unit.target: Metoden oppstår en `IndexOutOfRange` unntak hvis den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: GetOrdinal is kana-width insensitive.
trans-unit.target: GetOrdinal er kana bredde bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call GetOrdinal within a loop.
trans-unit.target: Ettersom ordenstall kodebasert oppslag mer effektivt enn navngitt oppslag, er det effektivt å kalle GetOrdinal i en sløyfe.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call GetOrdinal once and then assign the results to an integer variable for use within the loop.
trans-unit.target: I stedet kalle GetOrdinal én gang, og tilordne resultatene til et heltallsvariabel for bruk i sløyfen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the column.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref> som en representasjon av underliggende leverandøren bestemte felttypen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of objects that are a representation of the underlying provider specific values.
trans-unit.target: Henter en matrise av objekter som er en representasjon av de underliggende leverandøren bestemte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: For most applications, the GetProviderSpecificValues method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetProviderSpecificValues gir en effektiv måte for henting av alle kolonner i stedet for å hente hver kolonne individuelt for de fleste programmer.

trans-unit.source: You can pass an <xref:System.Object> array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende en <xref:System.Object>matrise som inneholder færre enn antall kolonner i resultatraden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Only the amount of data the <xref:System.Object> array holds is copied to the array.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye data i <xref:System.Object>matrisen oppbevarer kopieres til matrisen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: You can also pass an <xref:System.Object> array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også sende en <xref:System.Object>matrise lengden er lenger enn antall kolonner i resultatraden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref:System.DBNull> for null database columns.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref:System.DBNull>for null databasekolonner.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The number of instances of <xref:System.Object> in the array.
trans-unit.target: Antallet forekomster av <xref:System.Object>i matrisen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that describes the column metadata of the OracleDataReader.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som beskriver OracleDataReader kolonnen metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The GetSchemaTable method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader Column|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |ColumnName|The name of the column; this might not be unique.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetSchemaTable returnerer metadata om hver kolonne i denne rekkefølgen: | DataReader kolonnen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| | ColumnName | Navnet på kolonnen. Dette er kanskje ikke unike.

trans-unit.source: If the column name cannot be determined, a null value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kolonnenavnet ikke kan fastslås, returneres en nullverdi.

trans-unit.source: This name always reflects the most recent naming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinal|The zero-based ordinal of the column.
trans-unit.target: Dette navnet gjenspeiler alltid den nyeste navngivning av kolonnen i den gjeldende visning eller kommandoen teksten. | | ColumnOrdinal | Nullbasert ordenstallet i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSize|The maximum possible length of a value in the column.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnen kan ikke inneholde en nullverdi. | | ColumnSize | Mulig maksimumslengden for en verdi i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecision|If <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A> is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column.
trans-unit.target: Dette er størrelsen på datatypen for kolonner som bruker datatypen fast lengde. | | NumericPrecision | Hvis <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>er en numerisk datatype dette er den maksimale presisjonen på kolonnen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The precision depends on the definition of the column.
trans-unit.target: Presisjonen avhenger av definisjonen av kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: `Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary precision.| |NumericScale|If <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A> is a numeric data type, the number of digits to the right of the decimal point.
trans-unit.target: `Float`og `Double` datatyper i Oracle er binære presisjonen. | | NumericScale | Hvis <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>er en numerisk datatype antallet sifre til høyre for desimaltegnet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary scale.| |DataType|Maps to the common language runtime type of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>.| |IsLong|`true` if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data.| |AllowDBNull|`true` if the consumer can set the column to a null value; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Float`og `Double` datatyper i Oracle er binære skalaen. | | DataType | Kart for common language runtime typen <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>. | | IsLong | `true` Hvis kolonnen inneholder en binær lang objektet (BLOB) som inneholder lang data. | | AllowDBNull | `true` Hvis brukeren kan angi kolonnen til en nullverdi; hvis ikke, `false`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |IsUnique|`true`: No two rows in the base table-the table returned in <xref:System.Data.Common.SchemaTableColumn.BaseTableName> -can have the same value in this column.
trans-unit.target: En kolonne kan inneholde nullverdier, selv om den ikke kan settes til en nullverdi. | | IsUnique | `true`: To rader i tabellen i basistabellen returnerte i <xref:System.Data.Common.SchemaTableColumn.BaseTableName>-kan ha samme verdi i denne kolonnen.</xref:System.Data.Common.SchemaTableColumn.BaseTableName>

trans-unit.source: **IsUnique** is guaranteed to be `true` if the column constitutes a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column.
trans-unit.target: **IsUnique** vil finnes `true` Hvis kolonnen som utgjør en nøkkel i seg selv, eller hvis det er en betingelse av typen UNIQUE som bare gjelder for denne kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: `false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table.
trans-unit.target: `false`: Kolonnen kan inneholde duplikatverdier i basistabellen.

trans-unit.source: The default for this column is false.| |IsKey|`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne kolonnen er false. | | IsKey | `true`: Kolonnen er blant et sett med kolonner i Radsettet som samlet, identifiserer raden.

trans-unit.source: The set of columns with **IsKey** set to true must uniquely identify a row in the rowset.
trans-unit.target: Settet med kolonner med **IsKey** satt til SANN, må identifiserer en rad i Radsettet.

trans-unit.source: There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen krav at dette settet med kolonner som er et minimum antall kolonner.

trans-unit.source: This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index.
trans-unit.target: Denne kolonnesett kan genereres fra en basistabell primærnøkkel, en unik begrensning eller en unik indeks.

trans-unit.source: `false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |BaseTableName|The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: `false`: Kolonnen er ikke nødvendig identifiserer raden. | | BaseTableName | Navnet på tabell eller visning i datakilden som inneholder kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A null value if the base table name cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: En null-verdi hvis basistabellen navnet ikke kan fastslås.

trans-unit.source: The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnName|The name of the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne kolonnen er en nullverdi. | | BaseColumnName | Navnet på kolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This might be different than the column name returned in the **ColumnName** column if an alias was used.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være forskjellig fra navnet på returnerte i den **ColumnName** kolonnen hvis et alias ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: En null-verdi hvis basistypen kolonnenavnet ikke kan fastslås eller hvis kolonnen Radsettet avledede, men ikke identisk med, lagre en kolonne i dataene.

trans-unit.source: The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseSchemaName|The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne kolonnen er en nullverdi. | | BaseSchemaName | Navnet på skjemaet i datakilden som inneholder kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: En null-verdi hvis basistypen skjemanavnet ikke kan fastslås.

trans-unit.source: The default for this column is a null value.| A row is returned for every column in the results set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne kolonnen er en nullverdi. | Returneres en rad for hver kolonne i settet resultater.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To ensure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Å sikre at metadatakolonner returnere riktig, må du kaller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>med den `behavior` parameteren satt til `KeyInfo`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.
trans-unit.target: Noen av kolonnene i skjematabellen kan ellers returnere standard null eller ugyldig data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that describes the column metadata.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som beskriver kolonnemetadata.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref:System.DBNull> for null database columns.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref:System.DBNull>for null databasekolonner.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this method might be the result of the conversion from Oracle's Number data type to .NET Decimal type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av denne metoden kan være et resultat av konvertering fra datatypen for tall-Oracle's .NET desimaltypen.

trans-unit.source: If the value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal, this method throws an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException> that is an overflow exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er for stor til å være lagret i .NET-Decimal, denne metoden oppstår en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>som er en overflyt-unntak.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The value to return.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er for stor til å være lagret i .NET-Decimal.

trans-unit.source: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en matrise av objekter med kolonneverdiene i den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: For most applications, the GetValues method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetValues gir en effektiv måte for henting av alle kolonner i stedet for å hente hver kolonne individuelt for de fleste programmer.

trans-unit.source: You can pass an <xref:System.Object> array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende en <xref:System.Object>matrise som inneholder færre enn antall kolonner i resultatraden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Only the amount of data the <xref:System.Object> array holds is copied to the array.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye data i <xref:System.Object>matrisen oppbevarer kopieres til matrisen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: You can also pass an <xref:System.Object> array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også sende en <xref:System.Object>matrise lengden er lenger enn antall kolonner i resultatraden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref:System.DBNull> for null database columns.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref:System.DBNull>for null databasekolonner.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The value returned in the <xref:System.Object> array might be the result of the conversion from Oracle's Number data type to .NET Decimal type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres i den <xref:System.Object>matrise kan være et resultat av konvertering fra datatypen for tall-Oracle's .NET desimaltypen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal, this method throws an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException> that is an overflow exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er for stor til å være lagret i .NET-Decimal, denne metoden oppstår en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>som er en overflyt-unntak.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Object> into which to copy the attribute columns.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Object>som skal kopieres kolonnene attributtet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The number of instances of <xref:System.Object> in the array.
trans-unit.target: Antallet forekomster av <xref:System.Object>i matrisen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er for stor til å være lagret i .NET-Decimal.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> er lukket.

trans-unit.source: IsClosed and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A> are the only properties that you can call after the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> is closed.
trans-unit.target: IsClosed og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A>bare egenskaper som du kan ringe etter den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>er lukket.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.RecordsAffected%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> is closed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> er lukket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column contains non-existent or missing values.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kolonnen inneholder ikke-eksisterende eller manglende verdier.

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising an error, call this method to check for null column values before calling the typed Get methods (for example, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetByte%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetChar%2A>, and so on).
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden å se etter null kolonneverdiene før du kaller den innskrevne få metoder for å unngå å opprette feil (for eksempel <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetByte%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetChar%2A>og så videre).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetChar%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: Advances the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> to the next result
trans-unit.target: Flytter den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> til neste resultat

trans-unit.source: You must use a `REF CURSOR` when calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke en `REF CURSOR` når du kaller denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are more result sets; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det finnes flere resultatsett; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Advances the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> to the next record.
trans-unit.target: Flytter den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> til neste post.

trans-unit.source: The default position of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> is prior to the first record.
trans-unit.target: Standardposisjonen for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>er før den første posten.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call Read to begin accessing any data.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor kalle lese for å få tilgang til data.

trans-unit.source: More than one <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> can be open at any given time.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn én <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>kan være åpen om gangen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are more rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det finnes flere rader. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall rader som er endret, settes inn eller slettes ved kjøring av SQL-setningen.

trans-unit.source: The RecordsAffected property is not set until all rows are read and you close the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RecordsAffected er ikke satt til lese alle rader og lukker <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.IsClosed%2A> and RecordsAffected are the only properties that you can call after the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.IsClosed%2A>og RecordsAffected bare egenskapene som du kan ringe etter den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>er lukket.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.IsClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er endret, settes inn eller slettes.

trans-unit.source: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected, or the statement failed.
trans-unit.target: 1 for SELECT-setninger; 0 Hvis ingen rader ble påvirket eller -setningen mislyktes.
